html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Determine whether a vector is in the kernel or image of a linear transformation;
Determine whether a linear transformation is into or onto;
Describe the kernel of a linear transformation that is into;
Describe the image of a linear transformation that is onto.
Relate the concepts of into and onto with linear independence and span.

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has 5 videos totaling 31 minutes, plus some questions.
